Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our service.

scope.title: 1. Scope of Application
scope.content: These Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as 'Terms') apply to all services (hereinafter referred to as 'Service') provided by us. By using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

registration.title: 2. User Registration
registration.content: Some features of the Service may require user registration. Users must provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and keep their account information updated.

prohibitedActions.title: 3. Prohibited Actions
items: Actions that violate laws, regulations, or public order and morals
Acts that infringe upon the intellectual property rights, privacy, portrait rights, or other rights of third parties
Actions that damage or may damage the reputation or credibility of other users or third parties
Actions that discriminate against or slander other users or third parties
Distribution of computer viruses or other harmful computer programs
Any other actions deemed inappropriate by us

termination.title: 4. Termination of Use
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason including, but not limited to, a breach of the Terms.

disclaimer.title: 5. Disclaimer of Warranty
disclaimer.content: The Service is provided on an 'AS IS' and 'AS AVAILABLE' basis. We make no warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, regarding the Service, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement.

changes.title: 6. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will provide notification of any significant changes through our website or by email. Your continued use of the Service after such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the updated Terms.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and other details you provide when using our service. We also collect information automatically through cookies and similar technologies about how you use our website.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure security. This includes personalizing your experience, processing transactions, and analyzing usage patterns to enhance our service.

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share information with service providers who help us operate our business, when required by law, or with your consent.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have rights regarding your personal data, including the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict processing of your data. Please contact us to exercise these rights.

changes.title: 7. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on our website.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at support@svg-generator.com

LegalNotice.title: Legal Notice
LegalNotice.subtitle: Information based on the Act on Specified Commercial Transactions

LogoCreator.ai_prompt_label: Describe your logo idea to AI
LogoCreator.ai_placeholder: Example: A modern, simple logo for a tech company with blue and purple gradient
